title: Food Stuff + RHONJ Moms & RHOD 80s Style & Evan Ross Katz (Shut Up Evan) Pops In
itunes:title: Food Stuff + RHONJ Moms & RHOD 80s Style & Evan Ross Katz (Shut Up Evan) Pops In
itunes:subtitle: Danny talks about Bethenny's new HBO show, the Demi/frozen yogurt feud (NOTE/Trigger Warning: this conversation includes a brief discussion on eating disorders and food triggers), and then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of New Jer...
description:
Danny talks about Bethenny's new HBO show, the Demi/frozen yogurt feud (NOTE/Trigger Warning: this conversation includes a brief discussion on eating disorders and food triggers), and then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of New Jersey, which featured a book event on a yacht and the moms coming together. On The Real Housewives of Dallas the editors get creative with the 80s. After the recaps, Danny is joined by Shut Up Evan host Evan Ross Katz (@evanrosskatz) to talk about Tara Reid, Anna Faris, the current state of Housewives, Colton from The Bachelor's coming out, and lots more.


RHONJ Recap: 9:00ish

RHOD: 19:30ish

Evan Ross Katz: 27:00ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
